comments.text:
+Z200a Who Greenwald has defended as a lawyer has no more bearing on his 
political views than it does on any other lawyer's views. Or do you suppose 
that OJ's lawyers only wished they could help him murder Nicole and her 
boyfriend?

Greenwald had nearly-complete editorial freedom at the Guardian. He only 
left when MI5 started leaning on the Guardian to get them to rein him in. 
How likely do you think it is that he, AND Jeremy Scahill AND Laura 
Poitras, two journalists well-known for Liberal, leftist investigations, 
would sign on to be the lackeys of some billionaire? All three have 
established reputations, they've proven that they aren't like the coterie 
of gibbering fools at Fox News who'll read what they're told to read in 
front of the camera.

I think you're seriously misreading, or misrepresenting, their relationship 
to Mr. Omidyar. But only time will tell. Maybe in a couple of years their 
reps will be in the crapper and they'll all be kicking it on their own 
islands in the Caribbean.

Finally, you say that I "...have absolutely no idea whether Omidyar gives 
Greenwald "absolute editorial independence.""

...And then you follow it up with this little nugget from your nethers? 
"And you overlook the fact that Omidyar didn't hire Greenwald so he could 
exercise editorial independence. He hired him because he wants Greenwald to 
promote a very specific point of view -- the point of view Greenwald has 
come to embody."

Greenwald wouldn't have signed on without editorial independence, per his 
past actions, than you do to believe that it's all an evil Libertarian plot 
a la Bioshock.

top_comment.text:
When public television was first created, it was supposed to be owned by a 
publicly funded corporation. The ostensible purpose was to divorce public 
television content from the money power. Over the course of twenty years, 
these concepts and protections were inverted. PBS is now MSM - corporate 
ideology manufacturing center. That is, the same power that deregulated the 
banking system, also changed the law to enable for profit corporations to 
own programs on Public Television.


*The class which has the means of material production at its disposal has 
control at the same time over the means of mental production, so that 
thereby, generally speaking, the ideas of those who lack the means of 
mental production are subject to it.* (Marx & Engels: The German Ideology, 
cited in Curran et al. 1982: 22).


Fixing TYT : The correct formation is "PBS . . . You Got Some 'Splainin To 
Do" (I Love Lucy)﻿

top_comment.author: Gary Doss

comments.text: +iamihop That wasn't my point but yes they do. I've donated since the 80's.
comments.author: Gary Doss

comments.text:
Not as much as the MacArthur Foundation or Joan B. Kroc or the Ford 
Foundation, all of which have a liberal bent. How about the Gates? The 
Hewlett Foundation? There are a *lot* of liberals who support NPR/PBS. I'm 
a moderate one.
comments.author: iamihop

top_comment.text:
Jim Lehrer's PBS News Hour is on in Australia on SBS at 4:30pm daily. I 
always considered it one of the more neutral US news shows and was happy to 
give it my time. Nothing is sacred anymore.﻿
top_comment.author: papersplease

comments.text: +TheCultivatedMind Thanks Yoda.
comments.author: papersplease

comments.text:
The goal of virtually all propaganda is to make you believe it's neutral 
and unbiased.
comments.author: TheCultivatedMind

top_comment.text: I think it's hilarious when liberals bitch about media bias. ﻿
top_comment.author: Joe Haas

comments.text:
+IansMagickOak id keep arguing with you till the end of time and we will 
never see eye to eye, you have your perception of your reality and i have 
mine, many people agree with you and even more agree with me, the facts are 
there over 300 million guns in this country and they aren't going anywhere 
and there is not a solution that will please both sides of this argument, 
we live in a violent society that idolizes violence and guns themselves in 
the music,in movies, in games and in other forms of media making people 
visually immune to violence at an early age yet theres no regulation on any 
of that because it is protected under the first amendment, and the truth is 
the constitution system cannot work if a single amendment is deleted from 
it, i agree with background checks and i think there should be higher 
punishment on those who break the laws and there should be a greater effort 
to dry the supply of illegal guns instead of making law abiding citizens 
give up their rights. the 2nd amendment is in our constitution and of 
libertards such as yourself cant grasp that concept well thats just too bad 
because it isn't going to change, im done wasting brain cells on a 
libertarian for the day
comments.author: robb stark

comments.text:
since you are another mindless sheepeople with an ignorant mindset ill save 
myself the trouble of actually schooling you in what your country is really 
up to and how it really runs,but look up and google the koch brothers and 
their "donations to politicians" or the supreme court of justice and their 
new bill allowing companies and people to spend and unlimited amount of 
money bribing politicians then look up that nice anti gun senator who was 
involved in illegal gun trafficking and then tell me our government is not 
corrupt and seriously look it up, and tell me in these country that have 
banned guns how are their violent crimes going? newsflash criminals dont 
give a fuck about any gun laws in place they wont turn anything in and they 
will continue to kill people, the police will not magically appear when 
anyone needs them they only appear afterwards so you would have people 
defenseless and it would be whoever is physically dominant would rule, sir 
you have a victim mentality, why dont liberals go after the criminals 
instead of the poeple who follow the law? heres the deal i alongs with 
hundreds of thousands or millions of patriots have fought and many died for 
our country and the constitution and its my right to own my rifle and thats 
never going to change so get use to it libertard                           
                                                                            
                 i would explain "shall not be infringed" to you but i dont 
have a crayon and i dont speak dipshit...
comments.author: robb stark

comments.text:
+robb stark If you had a shred of anything factual you wouldn't need a wall 
of text to express it. History, the fact that the rest of the First World 
Countries that ban guns have a THOUSANDTH of the death toll to guns we 
have, all are on my side. The side of facts and truth. You want to conflate 
guns with freedom rather than the reality of what they mean, and you fight 
regulations that would make us safer and make it harder for the lunatics 
who misuse them to get them. If corporations really wanted them banned, 
they would be.

No, your entire text wall proves you're an unwitting dupe towing their 
rhetorical line.

You're dismissed.
comments.author: IansMagickOak

comments.text:
+IansMagickOak  it makes me sad that my country is being divided by 
political factions and are going against one another being puppets of the 
corporations that bribe them and its even sadder that the supreme court of 
justice allows it, everyone is just trying to push their agendas, instead 
of focusing on real problems in this country they go scaring people saying 
that an ar15 is a military assault rifle when ive fought in conflict areas 
and never have i used or seen anyone of any army use a semi automatic 
rifle, the politicians just want to feel useful by trying to ban a weapon 
that looks scary, what about the pistols that kill wayyyyy more than the 
ar15 ever will every single day in the streets? the media will not mention 
that because its not in the political agenda, the difference between the 
ar15 and any other wodden rifle is that the ar15 has more plastic cosmetic 
feature NOT MORE BALLISTIC POWER NOR A HIGHER FIRING RATE AND MILITARY 
RIFLES ARE FULLY AUTOMATIC OR SELECT FIRE WHY DAFUQ DONT LIBERALS GET THAT! 
and why cant we all just come together as american and get the money out of 
politic and get our country back from big companies instead of worrying 
about what way i chose as a patriot and a law abiding citizen to protect my 
family when im home and maybe someday this country when and if the time 
comes and i seriously hope that it never comes to that.
comments.author: robb stark

comments.text:
+IansMagickOak lol keep your mind in that false security bubble you live 
in, I took an oath to protect that constitution and that 2nd amendment is 
in place to protect the American people from a possible tyrannical 
government and my rifle just happens to be the best tool for the job, if in 
the future we have laser rifles guess what people will use...and of you 
believe that this country is immune to a tyrannical government then maybe 
you should go and read the news that's outside the mainstream media that 
has people thinking that ar15 are the problem when the truth is the 
politicians trying to ban them don't know shit about them and just want to 
ban them because they look scary, seriously stop being a sheepeople and 
open your eyes...
